help-file.title: "RAISE VAMPIRE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necromancer has a suitable corpse at his feet, "Raise Vampire" infuses the corpse with the brutal power of a Vampire. Vampires by nature are powerful warriors and enjoy tearing into warm, mortal flesh.
